description:
With the help of Eugene, Kajika was back in Singapore to take Lee-Leng back. Noei appears before them having been trusted with Rumaty’s life. Further, Kajika learns that Carl went to talk to Lee-Leng, and she is overwhelmed with gratitude for all of them. On the other hand, Zao is in shock at the news that Fi has been nominated as the next leader of the Huangs , and Lee-Leng has broke off his engagement with Ling-Lee. The two face off once again. Zao convinces Lee-Leng that it’s not too late yet but Lee-Leng does not budge and points a gun at Zao.
Source: crunchyroll
